display_name: Attuned Touch of the Nictus D
display_help: Enhances the accuracy of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Accuracy.Scale}%, reduces the endurance cost by {Boost.Attrib.Endurance.Scale}%, Enhances the healing potential and damage absorption of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Heal.Scale}%. NOTE: This enhancement can only be slotted into healing powers that require a To Hit check.
